title: Graded three card T206 lot for $old
author: Eric72

posts.post_title: Graded three card T206 lot for $old
posts.post_content:
Please see attached images of both the fronts and backs of these cards.  If someone would like to purchase a single card from this lot, the sale price would be $30.

Whether you buy a single card or the entire lot, I will send your purchase insured via USPS, at no extra charge, within the continental US.

Feel free to send me a PM with any questions you may have.

Best regards,

Eric
Anderson has been sold.  The other three cards are still for sale.
I'll take the other 3... thanks!   How would u prefer payment?   Just send info for payment

[quote name="jeffmcurrie" post=1272240]I'll take the other 3... thanks!   How would u prefer payment?   Just send info for payment[/QUOTE]

Thank you very much.  PM is on the way.

Best regards,

Eric
